ComicInfo.Title: Enter the Lizard
ComicInfo.Summary:
The most famous female cartoon star of all is back – and Dynamite has her! All-new adventures of Betty Boop (with her pals Koko the Clown and Bimbo, natch!) by award-winning writer Roger Langridge and Gisèle Lagacé. Join Betty as she works at the Oop-A-Doop Club, dreams of hitting the big-time, looks after her old Grampy… oh yeah, and FIGHTS GHOSTS! (Betty was always ahead of her time!).
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Howard Chaykin | 1 | B | Cover B | Roger Langridge | 2 | C | Halloween Costume Cover C | Gisele Lagace | 3 | D | Character Sheet Cover D | Max Fleischer | 4 | E | Coloring Book Cover E | J. Bone | 5 | F/RI | 1:15 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Cover | Howard Chaykin | 6 | G/Auth | Blank Authentix Cover | None | 7 |

ComicInfo.Characters: Betty Boop, Bimbo The Dog, Dolly the Witch, Grampy, Koko The Clown, Lenny Lizardlips, Mister Finkle, Pudgy, Sally Swing, Satan, Scat Skellington
